Posts.Content: MAUREENDF wrote: Help!!!  I am will be starting my 3 round of chemo next week, and I don't know what to do about the naaaauuussseea-YUCK!  The fatigue I can handle, but the sickness is so bad.  I stay in bed for 3 days after.  Is this normal with anyone else?  I am a stage II, and have 2 more chemo treatments to deal with, and am hoping someone can give me a suggestion on what to eat, not to eat.  To tell you the truth, I can't stand to eat anything after chemo. I lose like 5 pounds each time.  Is this normal too??? HELP___________thanks!! Love you all! Dx 1/21/2009, IDC Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Nausea! MAUREENDF Renrel
